entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump Trump, I am going to keep repeating this every day:

YOU FAILED AMERICA!! 

You called it a hoax. You didn't listen to the pleas of the medical community. You delayed invoking the DPA. You downplayed the seriousness of the virus. You delayed the response.

#Covid_19 #coronavirus
